requirements.summary: Ensure frontend build artifacts are ready for Version 37 deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Version 37 is built and deployed to the Internet Computer network.
The deployed canister reflects the state of Version 37.

file_operations.description: Verify that the application root component matches Version 37 specifications with correct routing configuration for Home, HowItWorks, Docs, Contact, and Results pages. No changes needed if Version 37 state is already present.
